trans-unit.source:
Since version 9.0 of the Yoast SEO extension, the prominent words on a page are being analyzed which are used for Insights and linking suggestions.
When you visit a page in the backend, this data is being analyzed automatically.
This crawler has been introduced to make your life easier and scan every site, page and language and update the needed data.

WARNING: For every page there are 2 requests being made: one for getting the page data, and one for saving the analysis.
On top of that, there is a request for getting the pages to analyze, 50 at a time.
Make sure your server is able to handle this and that this does not cause problems with your hosting provider.
